main: ^Also known as the first filipino hero. He was a datu (chief) of Mactan in the Visayas in the Philippines. He is best known for the Battle of Mactan that happened at dawn on April 27, 1521 where he and his warriors defeated the Spanish forces led by Portuguese explorer Ferdinand Magellan.

c-0: ^Magellan's death ended his voyage of circumnavigation. 40 years later Miguel Lopez de Legazpi continued the expeditions of Magellan, leading to the colonization of the Philippines for 333 years.
^Statues and Monuments of Lapulapu have been built all over the Philippines to honor Lapulapu's bravery against the Spaniards.
